topic.title: The is Not a Click- Away Shopping Site, what does that mean?

body.p: The was not designed to ever be a click-away shopping site. In the click-away model, the customer will be redirected to the actual merchant site at some point in the shopping experience.

However, customers will remain on the site throughout their shopping experience, as they browse the catalog, and add items to their cart. Upon check-out, the order is then placed with the merchant by an automated system, on behalf of the customer. The integration with the merchant is completely transparent from the customer perspective.
